channel.title: The Final Countdown
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Final Countdown" - it exists, but no info.

item.title: Re: The Final Countdown
item.content:encoded:
I'll add that item to the list soon. It is no big secret what the item does.
All you need to do to find out is try to bingo a Kaiju Kage.

item.title: Re: The Final Countdown
item.content:encoded: All i know is that like naito said it is only given to people who complete the IM which means you must be kage, and i will be going for IM in due time. But yes it does give strength and stam only. A nice perm i might add.

item.title: Re: The Final Countdown
item.content:encoded: anyone can be a kageâ€¦ that's exactly the point of his position.

item.title: Re: The Final Countdown
item.content:encoded: i knew you could get it from the impossible mission, but mcmasters post seems to imply anyone can get it, not just kages.

item.title: Re: The Final Countdown
item.content:encoded: It is given when you complete the Impossible Mission. If you want to find out what it does spar with a kaiju kage. It basically gives strength and stamina, how much i do not feel like disclosing.

item.title: The Final Countdown
item.content:encoded:
this is some sort of perm.
mcmasters mentions it here: http://s3.zetaboards.com/Random_Village/single/?p=8009877&t=7113907
and apparently the player sandric has one, (going by the magic of searching the wiki) though it's just part of his giant item list.

any info on it?
